entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
